PaymentCredit.name: PaymentCredit
PaymentCredit.description: Tracks the amount of money returned to the customer. The return can be a store credit, a gift card, or another type of credit. It's linked to the original payment record and includes the total credit amount issued.

AccountId.description: The account of the customer who made the payment.

Balance.description: Balance of payment credits (NetApplied - TotalCredit TransactionAmount - TotalCredit PendingTransactionAmount).

Comments.description: Provide additional details about the payment credit transaction.

CreditMemoId.description: ID of the credit memo associated with the payment credit.

CreditTypeCategory.description: A static enum showing the credit category type.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

EffectiveDate.description: Effective date of the payment credit.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

NetApplied.description: Total of all credit amounts apllied for this payment credit (TotalCreditApplied - TotalCreditUnapplied).

OrderPaymentSummaryId.description: ID of the order payment summary.

PaymentCreditNumber.description: ID of the payment credit record. This field is automatically generated.

PaymentId.description: ID of the payment associated with the payment credit.

ReturnOrderId.description: ID of the return order associated with the payment credit.

TotalApplied.description: Sum of all applied amounts from the payment credit line payment.

TotalUnapplied.description: Sum of all the unapplied amounts from the payment credit line payment.
